list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a broad piece of metal or another suitable material, held by straps or a handle attached on one side, used as a protection against blows or missiles.
a person or thing providing protection.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a protective coating of grease provides a shield against abrasive dirt
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một lớp phủ bảo vệ của dầu mỡ cung cấp một lá chắn chống lại bụi bẩn mài mòn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a large rigid area of the earth's crust, typically of Precambrian rock, which has been unaffected by later orogenic episodes, e.g. the Canadian Shield.
protect (someone or something) from a danger, risk, or unpleasant experience.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he pulled the cap lower to shield his eyes from the glare
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta kéo nắp dưới để che mắt khỏi ánh sáng chói
